layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x182
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x182
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x150
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 245x18
          text run at (0,0) width 245: "The next two bars should be identical:"

        LayoutText {#text} at (16,16) size 39x18
          text run at (16,16) width 39: "TEST"

        LayoutText {#text} at (16,16) size 39x18
          text run at (16,16) width 39: "TEST"
